title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 111.8 - Official forms
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 111.8 - Official forms

State Regulations

Forms promulgated by the Chief Administrator of the

Courts and the Commissioner of Mental Health, or either of them, shall be the
official forms for uniform use throughout the State in implementation of
article 730 of the Criminal Procedure Law. Variations in these forms will be
permitted if approved by the official or officials indicated in the following
index as having adopted them. INDEX OF FORMS FOR ARTICLE 730, CRIMINAL PROCEDURE
LAW
(See Chapter I of Subtitle D of this Title)
(A)

Jointly adopted forms. (A)
(1)

Examination Report. (A)
(2)

(3)

Dangerousness. (B)
